title: PDX Gender Neutral Bathrooms
name: PDX Gender Neutral Bathrooms
description:
A Map by Bailey

bathrooms in portland, see &lt;a href=&quot;http://safe2pee.org/beta/&quot;&gt;safe2pee&lt;/a&gt; for more or if you have anything to add!

properties.description: Posted by Bailey1110 NE Glisan, PORTLAND, OR, 97232-2705Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: act confidentSecond floor, to the right at the top of the stairsAt least nine to five. Very small office building; two bathrooms across from only one office with a small door and frosted glass. You won\'t be noticed.

properties.name: Adagio Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Bailey 3001 SE Belmont Street, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-4085Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: buy somethingSuper nice and clean!

properties.name: Appethaizing
properties.description: Posted by Bailey3207 se division st, PORTLAND, OR, 97202-1454Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureto the left from entranceyum.

properties.name: Augustana Lutheran Church
properties.description: Posted by Bailey2710 NE 14th Ave, PORTLAND, OR, 97212-3264Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsurecorner of 15th and Knott, ground floor bathrooms

properties.name: Bagdad Theatre
properties.description: Posted by Bailey 3702 SE Hawthorne Blvd, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-5146Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsurebetween the cafe/bar and the theatre.two stalls, cheap movies

properties.name: Belmont library
properties.description: Posted by Bailey1038 SE 39th Ave, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-4318Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: stroll right inMonday: 10 a.m.-6 p.m. Tuesday & Wednesday: noon-8 p.m. Thursday-Saturday: 10 a.m. - 6 p.m. Sunday: noon-5 p.m.

properties.name: Blend
properties.description: Posted by Bailey2327 E Burnside St, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-1655Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureYou get a key from the cafe, walk out behind the counter, and go up a couple of steps outside.Single stall; has a multi-gender bathroom sign with the pants figure labeled Women" and the skirt figure labeled "Men." I feel loved every time I look at it."

properties.name: Blue Nile
properties.description: Posted by Bailey2225 NE Broadway, Portland, ORAccess: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureto the left of the kitchen door

properties.name: Doug Fir Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Bailey 830 E. Burnside Portland, OR 97214Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureIn the foyer, on the right when entering the building/ left when coming from the restaurant.Single stall gender-neutral, usually quite clean for a bar bathroom!, no key.

properties.name: Echo
properties.description: Posted by Bailey2225 NE Martin Luther King Jr. Blvd, PORTLAND, OR, 97212-3727Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureThe two bathrooms are in the long hallway at the back of the restaurant, past the bar.

properties.name: Emanon
properties.description: Posted by Bailey1000 NW 17th Ave, PORTLAND, OR, 97209-2309Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureStraight back opposite the bar

properties.name: Emmanuel Hospital
properties.description: Posted by Bailey 501 N Graham St # 140, PORTLAND, OR, 97227-1654Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: act confidentgo through the main lobby entrance, turn right, walk down the hall. two gender neutral stalls.

properties.name: Fireside Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Bailey 1223 SE Powell, PORTLAND, OR, 97202-2437Access: YesType: GenderedAvail: buy somethingaround the corner in the back. gendered, but pretty secluded.

properties.name: Flying Pie Pizzeria
properties.description: Posted by Bailey7804 Se Stark St, Portland, OR, 97215Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: sneak inThe place is a bit of a maze and there may be multiple bathrooms, but for sure there\'s a unisex one off the back room (the room farthest east from the entrance, or nearest the movie theater next door). Look for the sign that says Restrooms.

properties.name: Fu-jin Restuarant
properties.description: Posted by Bailey3549 SE Hawthorne Blvd, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-5141Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureto the left of the counter

properties.name: Holgate library
properties.description: Posted by Bailey7905 SE Holgate, PORTLAND, OR, 97206-3367Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: stroll right inMonday: 10 a.m.-6 p.m. Tuesday & Wednesday: noon-8 p.m. Thursday-Saturday: 10 a.m.-6 p.m. Sunday: noon-5 p.m

properties.name: KBOO Radio
properties.description: Posted by Bailey20 SE 8th Avenue, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-1203Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureFirst floor, near reception desk.And they have the most awesome mint handsoap.

properties.name: Laughing Horse Books
properties.description: Posted by Bailey12 NE 10th Avenue, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-1310Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: stroll right inIn the back, on the left!020107 - admin says, address fixed!

properties.name: Laughing Planet Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Bailey 3320 SE Belmont St., PORTLAND, OR, 97214-4245Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: sneak inAt the back; you have to fetch the key at the front counter

properties.name: Lewis and Clark College
properties.description: Posted by Bailey0615 SW Palatine Hill, PORTLAND, OR, 97219-7879Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: ID requiredADA general access: student center, top floor, end of the hall across from the dining hall (there are two sex-specific restrooms, and one sex-blind). Guest access: guests of students living at the college can use nearly any residence hall restroom -- they default to gender-free/sex-blind status. Student ID or student host are needed to access residence hall restrooms, however.

properties.name: Mississippi Pizza Pub
properties.description: Posted by Bailey3552 North Mississippi Avenue, Portland, OR, 97227Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureto the right of the counter, two restrooms.great pizza and drinks!

properties.name: Muddy Waters
properties.description: Posted by Bailey2908 SE Belmont St, portlandAccess: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: sneak in2 Single-Stall Gender-Neutral Bathrooms (labeled as such) in rear of coffee shopWebsite: http://www.muddywatersportland.com/

properties.name: North Portland Library
properties.description: Posted by Bailey512 N Killingsworth St, Portland, ORAccess: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureOne on the main floor near the reference desk, one upstairs outside the meeting room

properties.name: Outside In
properties.description: Posted by Bailey1132 SW 13th Ave, Portland, OR 97205-1703Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsuremain floor, basementSigns are posted outside bathrooms that state Outside In respects the right of individuals to use the bathroom that corresponds with their gender identity.""

properties.name: Paradox Palace Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Bailey 3439 SE Belmont portland, orAccess: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsurein the way back, through the kitchen.their bathroom sign features the trans symbol! great place to eat!

properties.name: Pasta Bangs!
properties.description: Posted by Bailey3950 North Mississippi, PORTLAND, OR, 97227-1163Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: buy somethingOne single stall, non-gendered bathroom in rear of restaurant.Website: http://www.pastabangs.com/

properties.name: PeoplesFood Coop
properties.description: Posted by Bailey3029 SE 21st, PORTLAND, OR, 97202-2315Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureTo your left as you enter the door.

properties.name: Portland Airport
properties.description: Posted by Bailey7000 NE Airport Way, PORTLAND, OR, 97218-1009Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureby gate C3, family bathroommarked as family bathroom, accessible with changing area, etc

properties.name: Portland State University
properties.description: Posted by BaileyBroadway and Harrison, PORTLAND, OR, 97201Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: act confidentin Smith center on the Mezanine floor (between 2 & 3). ther are two lockable rooms back-to-back.school hours.

properties.description: Posted by Bailey3723 SE Hawthorne Blvd, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-5145Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureBack in the second room, by small press and zines section

properties.description: Posted by Bailey3901A N Williams, PORTLAND, OR, 97227-1465Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: stroll right inBehind the main register!http://www.scrapaction.org/

properties.name: SMYRC (Sexual Minority Youth Resource Center)
properties.description: Posted by Bailey2100 SE Belmont, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-2815Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureCoolest-looking Gender Neutral Bathroom in town!

properties.name: St. Johns Community Center
properties.description: Posted by Bailey8427 N Central St, PORTLAND, OR, 97203-3704Access: YesType: GenderedAvail: Not unsureFamily change/shower requires staff to unlock. Two other single user bathrooms off the auditorium.You may need to find a staff person to unlock single use rooms. Single sex restrooms open during business hours.

properties.name: Starbucks at World Trade Center
properties.description: Posted by Bailey910 SW 2nd Ave., PORTLAND, OR, 97204-3002Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: if the right person is workingStreet level, corner of SW 2nd and TaylorIt\'s a single-room locked bathroom. I believe you have to ask the barristas for the key. They are pretty friendly, though, so you may not have to buy anything.

properties.name: Stumptown Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Bailey 3377 SE Division St, PORTLAND, OR, 97202-1471Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureIn the back. Has a keygood coffee!

properties.name: Stumptown Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Bailey 128 SW 3rd Ave, PORTLAND, OR, 97204-2705Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureIn the back. Has a keyTwo stalls

properties.name: Stumptown Coffee
properties.description: Posted by Bailey 3356 SE Belmont St, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-4245Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureIn the back.lovely coffee!

properties.name: The Fine Grind
properties.description: Posted by Bailey2035 SE 39th Street, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-5911Access: NoType: GenderedAvail: buy somethingTo the left, past the counter and back kitchen.Converted from a house\'s bathroom (so there\'s a shower stall in it and everthang). You could probably get away with just using the bathroom, but it\'s a small coffee shop, so they\'d prefer that you at least buy something.

properties.name: The Fresh Pot
properties.description: Posted by Bailey3729 SE Hawthorne Blvd, PORTLAND, OR, 97214-5145Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsure

properties.name: The Watertower
properties.description: Posted by Bailey5331 SW Macadam Ave, PORTLAND, OR, 97239-6104Access: NoType: GenderedAvail: stroll right inI believe there are several on every floor, and there are signs everywhere. At least nine to five. Probably later.

properties.name: Value Village
properties.description: Posted by Bailey4420 Ne Hancock St, Portland, ORAccess: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: stroll right inAsk for key at front desk, bathroom is on the right from the entrance.I don\'t know *how* accessible this makes it, but it\'s the largest single-toilet bathroom I\'ve ever seen in my life - roomy and spacious, could be a bedroom. Open til 9 most days? 6 or 7 on Sundays.

properties.name: Veganopolis
properties.description: Posted by Bailey412 Sw 4th Ave, Portland, ORAccess: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsurein the back of the cafecool toilets

properties.name: YWCA of Greater Portland
properties.description: Posted by Bailey1111 SW 10th Ave., PORTLAND, OR, 97205-2411Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureTo the left on the first floorSigns in the building indicate that the Y supports folks\' use of bathrooms based on their gender identity. Hours M-F 6am-9pm, Sat 7am-6pm, Sun 10am-6pm

properties.name: Yakuza
properties.description: Posted by Bailey5417 NE 30th Ave., PORTLAND, OR, 97211-6803Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureStraight back behind the main section, to the left

properties.name: don pancho's taqueria
properties.description: Posted by Bailey2000 ne alberta st, PORTLAND, OR, 97211-5848Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureto the right as you enter, just after the trash containersyummy veggie chimichangas and veggie burritos. cheapest burritos in town, actually. really good green hot sauce(mild)

properties.name: half and half
properties.description: Posted by Bailey923 sw oak st, PORTLAND, OR, 97205-2804Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsurestraight back when you enter.yummy chai. awesome waitstaff.

properties.name: monsoon thai
properties.description: Posted by Bailey4236 n mississippi ave, PORTLAND, OR, 97217-3133Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsuretheres two entrances to this establishment. the one from the sidewalk off mississippi is the accessible side, with a ramp. bathroom closest to this entrance (near cash register)please try the drunken noodles. please try the pumpkin curry.

properties.name: starbucks at pacwest building
properties.description: Posted by Bailey1211 sw 5th ave, PORTLAND, OR, 97204-3713Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsurego into front of main building, turn right to go the starbucks. bathroom on left right thru door to coffee shop.p.s. fuck starbucks, use their bathroom and dont feel pressured to buy...i do it everyday.

properties.name: thai peacock
properties.description: Posted by Bailey219 sw 9th ave, PORTLAND, OR, 97205-2801Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsurein the back past cash registeryummy basil fried rice, yummy everything. try any of the delicious curries

properties.name: veloshop
properties.description: Posted by Bailey211 sw 9th ave, PORTLAND, OR, 97205-2801Access: NoType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsurein the back of the storeask to use, patron the shop. high-end bike dork shop

properties.description: Posted by Bailey1210 nw couch st, PORTLAND, OR, 97209-4115Access: YesType: GenderFreeAvail: Not unsureupstairs next to housewares, right as you get to the top of stairs/out of the elevator
